mapper.select: select p.plan_id as planId, p.member_id as memberId, plan_title as planTitle, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, plan_description as planDescription, hit, count(ph.plan_id) as planHeart from plan p left join plan_heart ph on p.plan_id = ph.plan_id group by p.plan_id order by hit DESC;
mapper.update: update plan set hit = hit + 1 where plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.insert: insert into plan( member_id, plan_title, start_date, end_date, plan_description) values( #{memberId}, #{planTitle}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{planDescription});
mapper.select: select p.plan_id as planId, p.member_id as memberId, plan_title as planTitle, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, plan_description as planDescription, hit, count(ph.plan_id) as planHeart from plan p left join plan_heart ph on p.plan_id = ph.plan_id where p.plan_id in (select plan_id from plan_heart where member_id=#{memberId}) group by p.plan_id;
mapper.delete: delete from plan_heart where member_id=#{memberId} and plan_id=#{planId};
